Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode

Class EasyEncoders

java.lang.Object
com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode
com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.EasyEncoders
@Autonomous @Disabled public class EasyEncoders extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
Easy Encoder Class has methods that make it easier to use encoders **NOTE** this class requires the BaseConstants class to be in the same folder and configured TICKS IS THE MAIN UNIT USED IN ALL METHODS THAT MOVE
See Also:
